name: Class RecordedClass
text: A recorded Java type, such as a class or an interface.
codes:
public final class RecordedClass
extends RecordedObject

methods.description:
Returns the modifiers of the class.
 
 See Modifier

Returns the class loader that defined the class.
 
 If the bootstrap class loader is represented as null in the Java
 Virtual Machine (JVM), then null is also the return value of this method.

Returns the fully qualified name of the class (for example,
 "java.lang.String").

Returns a unique ID for the class.
 
 The ID might not be the same between Java Virtual Machine (JVM) instances.
